title: Cash Shop Update for October 25
content: Halloween Surprise Style Box, Royal Styles, Ghost Bride Package, Vampire Phantom Package, and more!

title: Scheduled Minor Patch - October 26, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled minor patch on Thursday, October 26, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 11:00 PM AEDT).

title: MapleStory Fest 2023 Recap
content: On October 14, MapleStory Fest returned to sunny Los Angeles, CA, for an in-person gathering.
